import React from "react"; // react plugin used to create charts import { Line, Bar, Doughnut } from "react-chartjs-2"; // react plugin for creating vector maps import { VectorMap } from "react-jvectormap"; // reactstrap components import { Card, CardBody, CardFooter, CardTitle, Row, Col, } from "reactstrap"; // react plugin used to create DropdownMenu for selecting items import Select from "react-select"; class Transactions extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { fund: null, client: null, book: null, counterparty: null, excounterparty: null, singleSelect: null, multipleSelect: null, tagsinput: ["Amsterdam", "Washington", "Sydney", "Beijing"], }; } handleTagsinput = (tagsinput) => { this.setState({ tagsinput }); }; render() { return ( <>

Option Transaction

Overview

Fund

this.setState({ client: value }) } options={[ { value: "", label: "Select One", isDisabled: true, }, { value: "2", label: "Foobar" }, { value: "3", label: "Is great" }, ]} placeholder="Select client..." />

Book

this.setState({ counterparty: value }) } options={[ { value: "", label: "Single Option", isDisabled: true, }, { value: "2", label: "Foobar" }, { value: "3", label: "Is great" }, ]} placeholder="Single Select" />

Executing Counterparty

this.setState({ fund: value }) } options={[ { value: "", label: "Select One", isDisabled: true, }, { value: "2", label: "Fund" }, { value: "3", label: "Option2" }, ]} placeholder="Select fund..." />

Direction

this.setState({ book: value }) } options={[ { value: "", label: "Select One", isDisabled: true, }, { value: "2", label: "Foobar" }, { value: "3", label: "Is great" }, ]} placeholder="Select book..." />

Currency

Direction

); } } export default Transactions;
